channel.title: Omfg! Best signature i have ever seen in my life!
channel.description:
[img]http://www.gfxgamers.net/forums/images/sigrotation/rotator.php[/img]
Ok, this isnt my sig & it was made by a friend of my friend, friend...hope you dont get confused by it...lol [size=7pt]Refresh your page and watch this sig change...best i have ever seen.... so amazing![/size]

item.title: Omfg! Best signature i have ever seen in my life!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

You could do this in javascript also…

Anyways this friend is obviously a low payed, standard no imagination graphics designer who make logos for sites that are run part time by some bodys uncle.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg! Best signature i have ever seen in my life!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

dorkinator:

It’s bs its just abunch of sigs layerd on top of eachother. If he is a Graphix designer he must be flat broke.

Amen. If he designs graphics, he sucks big floppy donkey dick. These are so basic it should be illegal. Its all done with brushes and cheap animation.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg! Best signature i have ever seen in my life!
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:6, topic:114091”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=163212.msg1526551#msg1526551 date=1182393848]

its the best because it changes once in a while… You’ll see the difference when you come back. You can even bookmark this sig link and see…

OMG! A noob that has Imageready for 10 minutes could figure out how to do that.

Nothing special TBH…
[/quote]

actually, its dont in php
It just picks a new sig to show every time the page is refreshed[/quote]

Just noticed it a .php

I just saw it change so… I assumed… Yea.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg! Best signature i have ever seen in my life!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:

Whats so great about it? A picture in the background, some brushing. Text and cheap basic animation done with a clipping mask. The best looking thing is the text.
